Epic game, if you like playing as a dino then this is for you. i just got off the game. I was a rex with 3 others rex's and we had 3 long necks, some other little cridders runing around to. Theres no voice chat, and you dont see someones name until your right up on then. You have to be careful yet nice, to make friends. 

The Dev is online alot on the New York server and chats with people and has fixed problems right as they come to point. He has alot of plans for this game. I now $20 can look a little steep, but i say for what the game may become its more than worth it.

10/10 would RRRAAAAWWWWWRRRR!!!! again.
Jogo muito bom, mesmo sendo um pouco antigo vale muito a pena, pois √© divertido da para jogar com amigos e muito mais... Super recomendo !!

I have played this game for a couple of years now and has been following it since Day 1. I've seen this game grow and change for the better and for the worst. I've always been a fan of this game, but lately there has been a few bugs in it. Some of which may be a deal breaker for some people. Like the lobby crashing and not loading into a game and the hitboxes are sometimes out of this world bad. But other than that I do recommend this game for anybody that just wants to pass the time. And hopefully they continue to make this game better and better and fix some things in the near future.

Muy buen juego, divertido pero no es recomendable desperdiciar tu dinero cuando un motivo de ban es sufrir algun bug del juego y te reporten, osea los bugs que tiene el juego y que muchos nisiquiera puedes evitarlos, es motivo para que te den un ban permanente ... bugs que llevan muchos a√±os en el juego y no arreglan.
I really like This game its super fun but its all based on if the killer camps or not but it is a bit buggy but all around fun
The key of survive is beeing calm and make carefull your choices in the match.

Friends got me into it. LOT of fun. Good for playing with friends or alone. Some funny and annoying bugs but nothing too frustrating. Both killer and survivor roles are equally balanced and fun to play.
great game!!! would highly recommend for horror gamer's and people who likes to solve stuff out while there's a thrill experience to it.

Game is decent, but then you realize the devs are worried about cranking out microtransactions and unbalanced characters instead of making dedicated servers. God forbid they have to spend any of that microtransaction money to make the game more enjoyable. Currently Killers host the game and if they don't like the lobby they have, they will either lobby dodge constantly andwaste time, or pull the plug in loading so that you waste rare items. Also plenty of Killer hosts have crappy 3rd world ping and/or constantly pull the plug to cheat or a multitude of reasons. Also the playing with friends UI is incredibly annoying having to exit to main menu every single time a Killer lobby dodges or after every game/disconnect. A simple quality of life improvement would be having persistent lobbies with friends along with dedicated servers, but they are worried about microtransactions and cranking out unbalanced characters for greed.

Killers host the game. If you're not getting a host from Guatemala giving everyone 300 ping and teleporting around the map, youre getting a cheater host who plug pulls to make you waste offerings, make someone disconnect during loading match so its 3v1 or 2v1, or last but not least just straight plug pull to teleport around the map. Sad that a game can go this long without dedicated servers especially when players can grief with killer. Horrible game design

Also you be prepared for Killer hosts constantly dodging lobbies because you are playing with friends and using items. If they dont grief you they will just dodge before the game starts. And due to the game's horrible game design you have to quit all the way out and back to the menu, invite all your friends again, ready up, and wait to join another lobby. As I'm writing this We've spent 10 minutes constantly rejoining lobbies because killers are dodging.

This game is a lot of fun and if they keep adding killers and cosmetics it would be lovely, but my main main main issue is.... IT TAKES SO GOTDANG LONG TO FIND PLAYERS IN THE LOBBY, its borderline unplayable in how long one has to wait as killer for 4 people to show up.... it feels like there's only 4 people on the planet playing and I am SURE that is not the case... ive been in ques for over 40 mins for a single game...  fix that. please.
No vale el precio nuevo .. gg
I'm really enjoying this game. It is very fun and i think i would recommend you to buy it :)
